name: costrutto
description:
Costrutto is only about building your dream Italian Villa, placing block to block. Choose your style from more than 5 different variations. There is no particular essence of the game. Just keep calm & build to the relaxing Lo-Fi music.

Gameplay
You are on an empty place in the middle of some Italian waters and the only thing you can do is Build!

Setting
The only style in which you can build your marvelous townhouse is Italian. But there are a plenty of different-colored options.

Athmosphere
The feeling you are getting from playing the Costrutto is freedom of everything. You can raise all the structures you've ever imagined.
